department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply, deliver and install one (1) new Segmented flow analyzer to Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada, Morden, MB.
description: Supply, deliver, and install one (1) new Segmented flow analyzer to Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada, Morden, MB.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
****************************************************

### Request for Proposal

#### Document ID
WS3752989625-Doc3770040833

#### Publication Date
2022-12-23

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-01-19 14:00:00 EST

#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Segmented flow analyzer to be installed at Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's location in Morden, MB.

#### Background
The Solicitation Registration Number for this RFP is WS3752989625, and it is categorized under Laboratory and Scientific Equipment (UNSPSC code: 41100000).

#### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions for Tendering**: None

#### Business Requirements
The bidder must supply, deliver, and install one (1) new Segmented flow analyzer at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's location in Morden, MB.

#### Evaluation Criteria
*   Tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Notice Details
*   **Publication URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14930917](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14930917)
*   **Contracting Entity Information**
    *   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   Contact: Sallie Boutin
        *   Email: <sallie.boutin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

Note: The RFP has been amended with a revised closing time of 2023-01-19 14:00:00 EST.

### Contact Information
Sallie Boutin
PSPC
 Phone: Not Applicable
Email: <sallie.boutin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

### Amendment Details
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 19, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00:00 EST will be declared non-responsive. 

**Cancellation Notice:** The tender has been cancelled, in accordance with the original terms set forth in the RFP. No further procurement opportunities
